params.issuerId: ID of issuer whose admin is being transferred.
params.newAdmin: Address of the new admin taking over.
params.oldAdmin: Address of the current admin being replaced.

params.issuerId: Unique identifier for the newly registered issuer.
params.name: Name of the issuer registered.

params.issuerId: ID for the issuer to whom the public key belongs.
params.publicKeyId: ID for the public key being updated.
params.status: New status of the public key.

params.enabled: Boolean indicating whether the stack is enabled or disabled for the public key.
params.issuerId: Unique identifier for the issuer to whom the public key belongs.
params.publicKeyId: Unique identifier for the public key.
params.verificationStackId: Identifier for the verification stack being updated.

params.contextID: Context identifier for the signature state being updated.
params.issuerId: Issuer identifier related to the signature state.
params.newRoot: New root hash for the signature state tree.
params.typeId: Type identifier for the signature state being updated.

params.contextID: Context identifier for the signature state being updated.
params.issuerId: Issuer identifier related to the signature state.
params.newTreeURI: New URI for the signature state tree.
params.typeId: Type identifier for the signature state being updated.

addPublicKey(uint256,uint8,uint256,bytes.details: add a new public key to the issuer.

getIssuer(uint256).details: return the issuer, if not exists, revert.

getPublicKeyRaw(uint256,uint256).details: return the public key, if not exists, revert.

getSignatureState(uint160,uint160,uint25.details: return the status of the public key, if not exists, returns UNINITIALIZED.

getSignatureStateRoot(uint160,uint160,ui.details: return the root of the signature state, if not exists, returns empty bytes.

getSignatureStateURI(uint160,uint160,uin.details: return the status of the public key, if not exists, returns empty string.

isPublicKeyActive(uint256,uint256).details: return if public key is active. If public key is not exists, return false.

isPublicKeyActiveForStack(uint256,uint25.details: return if public key is active for the verification stack. If public key is not exists, return false.

setSignatureState(uint160,uint160,uint25.details: set both the signature state URI and root.

transferIssuerAdmin(uint256,address).details: transfer the admin of the issuer

updatePublicKeyStatus(uint256,uint256,ui.details: update the status of the public key.

updatePublicKeyVerificationStack(uint256.details: update the status of the public key.

IssuerAdminTransferred(uint256,address,a.notice: Emitted when an issuer's administrative role is transferred to a new address.

IssuerRegistered(uint256,string).notice: Emitted when a new issuer is registered in the registry.

PublicKeyStatusUpdated(uint256,uint256,u.notice: Emitted when the status of a public key is updated.

PublicKeyVerificationStackUpdated(uint25.notice: Emitted when the verification stack for a public key is updated.

SignatureStateRootUpdated(uint160,uint16.notice: Emitted when the signature state root is updated for a specific type and context.

SignatureStateURIUpdated(uint160,uint160.notice: Emitted when the signature state URI is updated for a specific type and context.
